text: The 1978 Australian Professional Championship was a professional non-ranking snooker tournament, which took place in August 1978. Eddie Charlton won the tournament defeating Ian Anderson 29–13 in the final. ==Results== ===Group stage=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width=20|POS !width=165|Player !width=20|MP !width=20|MW !width=20|FW !width=20|FL !width=20|FD !width=20|PTS |- style="background:#aaffaa;" |1||style="text- align:left;"| Eddie Charlton |3||3||24||2||+24||6 |- |2||style="text- align:left;"| Ian Anderson |2||2||16||8||+8||4 |- |3||style="text- align:left;"| Warren Simpson |2||1||12||11||+1||2 |- |4||style="text- align:left;"| Philip Tarrant |2||1||10||14||-4||2 |- |5||style="text- align:left;"| Paddy Morgan |1||0||6||8||-2||0 |- |6||style="text-align:left;"| Lou Condo |1||0||6||8||-2||0 |- |7||style="text-align:left;"| Jim Charlton |1||0||1||8||-7||0 |- |8||style="text-align:left;"| Dennis Wheelwright |2||0||4||20||-16||0 |} * Eddie Charlton 8–1 Dennis Wheelwright * Eddie Charlton 8–1 Jim Charlton * Warren Simpson 12–3 Dennis Wheelwright * Ian Anderson 8–6 Paddy Morgan * Ian Anderson 8–2 Philip Tarrant * Philip Tarrant 8–6 Lou Condo * Eddie Charlton 8–0 Warren Simpson ===Final=== * Eddie Charlton 29–13 Ian Anderson ==References== Category:1978 in snooker Category:Sport in Australia Category:Defunct snooker competitions
title: 1978 Australian Professional Championship
